Title: Ship It!
Description:
What a haul! I was able tae give a bit of what we found tae Dagran so he could finish off one of his projects. He should be here any minute. 

Ah, I can't hold back. Surprise! It's a gift tae help you get around.
CompletionText: Wait 'till ye see what Dagran has cooked up.
RewardText:
You'll be able tae use this machine tae move around Khaz Algar. We'll let ye know when we have more parts for it!

Now that we've got that out of the way, we got some delves tae explore!
